name: Mat-Tug-Matics
description:
Created for BCI Games’ 3-day game jam that utilizes Brain-Computer Interface as controls.

In Mat-Tug-Matics, two players will go head to head in solving math problems to drag their opponent into the endless pothole in the middle of the street!

Credits

Rocco Wu - Game Designer & Gameplay Engineer

Esprii Chapman - Props & Environmental Art

Sarah Aswegan - Hardware Integration

Joana Keough - UI Design

Daniel Comaduran - Game Designer & Math Engineer

Eli Kinney - Lang - Brain Computer Interface Engineer
